root: ^I don't recognize you immediately... can you remind me of your name?
^Ah yes, of course. [player_name], my beloved pupil!
^Did you have a nice lunch break?

YES: ^That's great to hear! Now we can get back to work with a full stomach!
NO: ^Oh no, how unfortunate! I have a biscuit for you here somewhere, if I can find it.
CONV: ^After my own lunch break I'm giving a lecture in which I want to explain the function of the heart and the lungs to my university students.
^Could you finish this wax model for me?
^Don't worry if you've forgotten our dissection sessions.
^You will have to find them yourself, though.
^This is the icon that's on the cover of the book in which you've written the notes on the heart.
^Take a walk around and see if you can find this logo on the display cases!
